examples.example: 生活中总会时不时出现一些惊喜，让我们感到无比快乐和幸福。

translate.english: There will always be some surprises from time to time in life, making us feel extremely happy and blissful.

examples.example: 她的生日聚会上充满了各种惊喜，让她十分感动。

translate.english: Her birthday party was filled with all kinds of surprises, which made her very touched.

examples.example: 当我打开礼物盒时，那份意想不到的惊喜让我开心不已。

translate.english: When I opened the gift box, the unexpected surprise made me extremely happy.
